name: Twilight Blues
description:
Twilight Blues is our popular polish Midnight blues close relative. The only difference between the two is that Twilight Blues has a glossy finish and its the tiniest bit of a brighter blue with just a touch more holo!

We love this as a plain full mani. This would also serve well as a base for any nail art or stamping manicure.

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free. 
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed. 
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle. 
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE! 
Some of our colored polishes are extremely pigmented. Please do not forget to use a coat or two of a quality base coat! 
Seal your manicure with a quality topcoat

name: Nudist
description:
Plain beige base color packed with black shreds and tiny hexes plus white hexes and tiny dots. From afar Nudist looks like a barely there natural manicure. Look closer and it really is quite a show stopper.

We honestly see this polish working best just as it is. Nothing more, nothing less. 

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free. 
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed. 
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle. 
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE! 
Some of our colored polishes are extremely pigmented. Please do not forget to use a coat or two of a quality base coat! 
Seal your manicure with a quality topcoat

name: Evergreen
description:
Sightly holographic, Evergreen is a muted green polish with a glossy finish. If you loved Pickled but didnt want the "pickle" texture effect, this is the polish for you!

We can see Evergreen as a plain mani, in a gorgeous camo mani, or in any fall themed mani. This is a super versatile color.

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free. 
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed. 
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle. 
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE! 
Some of our colored polishes are extremely pigmented. Please do not forget to use a coat or two of a quality base coat! 
Seal your manicure with a quality topcoat

name: Lil Miss Sunshine
description:
Lil Miss Sunshine.... this polish is seemingly unfitting for the season isnt it? We made this beautiful bold yellow polish to remind our Bombshells that bright colors and making a statement isnt just for spring and summer! Lets be explosive all year round!

Base color, accent nail, full mani... You name it, Lil Miss Sunshine can be used any way you want!

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free. 
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed. 
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle. 
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE! 
Some of our colored polishes are extremely pigmented. Please do not forget to use a coat or two of a quality base coat! 
Seal your manicure with a quality topcoat

name: Raspberry Fudge
description:
Raspberry Fudge is a BEAUTIFUL berry/brown polish with a splash of holo. Its oxblood with a twist!

This polishes holographic sparkle and deep vampy shade make it perfect for a dark fall manicure. Paired with a lighter glitter topper, the possibilities are endless.

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free. 
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed. 
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle. 
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE! 
Some of our colored polishes are extremely pigmented. Please do not forget to use a coat or two of a quality base coat! 
Seal your manicure with a quality topcoat

name: Hazy
description:
Hazy is a simple pale gray nail polish. It looks great on every skin tone and is simply perfect for a fall nude manicure!

We at Fuse love this as a plain full mani. This would also serve well as a base for any nail art or stamping manicure.

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free. 
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed.
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle. 
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!
Some of our colored polishes are extremely pigmented. Please do not forget to use a coat or two of a quality base coat! 
Seal your manicure with a quality topcoat

name: Holy Holo!
description:
Holy Holo! Is our very own holographic topcoat! It adds a special diamond shimmer in natural light but under artificial light a rainbow shimmer can be seen.

The BIG difference between Holy Holo! and other popular holographic topcoat is that our holo is 100% FDA approved and completely safe!

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free. 
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =] 
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle. 
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Disqeaux
description:
Disqeaux (Disco) is a glitter bomb that you wont soon forget! Magenta, purple, turquoise, and gold packed together so perfectly you can achieve a smooth gap-less mani of pure glitter!

Which lucky Bombshell will grab Disqeaux first?

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: We Like to Party
description:
We Like to Party is a mash up of our favorite crazy colored glitters in one fun polish! Blue, green, purple, turquoise, and pink all in one glitter bomb? Oh yeah, lets party!

Which lucky Bombshell will grab We Like to Party first?

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Great Balls of Fire
description:
Great Balls of Fire is a super bold orange, textured polish. It is mixed with shimmering tiny sliver hexes that make this polish another of of our personal favorites!

Which lucky Bombshell will grab Great Balls of Fire first?

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Shocking Chameleon
description:
Shocking Chameleon reminds us of a crazy looking lizard with neon spots. The creamy yellow/lime base is broken up by neon green hexes. It has a dash of holo just to give it that extra little spark.

Which lucky Bombshell will grab Shocking Chameleon first?

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: In The Navy
description:
In The Navy is one of our favorite of our new Operation Explosive Exclusive polishes. A deep, dark navy base is accented with white bars and hexes, tiny gold hexes, and turquoise shreds. It has a jelly like consistency that makes it a dream to layer!

Which lucky Bombshell will grab In The Navy first?

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Fall Campfire
description:
Fall Campfire has a warm, cozy, woodsy feel to it. Red dots, orange shreds, brown hexes, and pale yellow hexes come together to create this concoction.

Honestly.... this polish is great all by itself. We are sure it would look great as a glitter topper, but quite frankly we love it solo!

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Pickled
description:
Pickled looks exactly how it sounds! This bold green has a touch of texture and a matte finish. This combo makes the finished product look just like..... well, a pickle!

*click the second picture for a close up

This polish is unique. Besides the matte finish, besides the slight texturing, it also is versatile. If you add a clear coat you can smooth and gloss this gorgeous green up!

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Coo Coo Coconuts
description:
Coo Coo Coconuts is packed with all different shapes and sizes of gold, white, and dark brown glitter. Its like a coconut went through a blender! Fresh and fun!

This glitter bomb has the makings of a perfect accent nail for a French Manicure! We love how it shimmers in the light.

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Zombie Snot
description:
Guess who's baaaaaaaack!

Zombie Snot is back and better than ever. In addition to the older combo of neon green hexes and tiny black glitter we have added some funky black shreds to the mix!

Like before this wild thing is great on its own, but really adds something special to a base color. Around Halloween we would wear it either alone in layers or over a deep bloody red. All year round pair it with a contrasting neon base to make those fingers pop!

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Sugar Momma
description:
Sugar Momma is a beautiful lavender polish with a touch of holo. This polish is classy and sassy!

This blend looks amazing alone, but we would love it even more as an accent nail to a simple mani!

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!

name: Lotta Watermelon
description:
Lotta Watermelon is a fun summer polish. This glitter bomb is full of lime green hexes, hot pink squares, and a dusting of tiny pink glitter. 

We love this alone in layers or over a base coat! Try it over your favorite bolder shades to really let those neon glitter stand out.

Fuse Nail Polish is 3 free and cruelty free.
There may be very slight variations between each bottle as each is hand mixed with love =]
We include 2 stainless steel mixing balls in each bottle.
Some settling of glitter may occur so SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!
